title: Fix recording button state transitions and hover behavior

requirements.text: When recording stops, the recording button must immediately return to its inactive blue state instead of staying red

quotes: Le bouton doit redevenir bleu (ou dans son état inactif) dès que l'enregistrement est arrêté

acceptanceCriteria: Recording button displays blue color when not recording
Recording button transitions from red to blue immediately when stopRecording is called
Button state accurately reflects isRecording state from useSpeechRecognition hook

requirements.text: The recording button must maintain its opacity and not become transparent when the cursor leaves the button area

quotes: Le bouton ne doit pas devenir transparent quand le curseur est enlevé

acceptanceCriteria: Button remains fully opaque when cursor hovers over it
Button remains fully opaque when cursor leaves the button
No transparency transitions occur on mouse enter or leave events

constraints: Do not modify the overall layout and positioning of the interface
Preserve the existing three-button rectangular layout
Maintain French language labels on buttons
nonGoals: Modifying other UI elements beyond the recording button
Changing the visual design of the view or delete buttons
